info.title: Mstore API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Mstore E-commerce Backend

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's complete profile information including addresses, wallet, points, orders, and wishlist.

put.description: Change the authenticated user's password. Requires current password verification.
Update the authenticated user's profile information including name, email, phone, and profile image.
Update the vendor's store profile. Only available for users with vendor role.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a vendor

get.description: Returns all addresses for the authenticated user.

post.description: Add a new shipping/billing address for the authenticated user.

get.description: Returns a single address with full details.

put.description: Update an existing address. Only the address owner can update it.

delete.description: Delete an address. Cannot delete default address if it's the only one.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all uploaded media files. Vendors and consumers only see their own uploads.

post.description: Upload an image or file. Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, svg, pdf, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, csv, txt, zip. Maximum file size varies by server configuration.

id.description: Attachment ID to use in other requests

422.description: Validation error - Invalid file type or size

message.example: The file must be a file of type: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp.

get.description: Returns a single attachment with full details.

put.description: Update attachment metadata such as alt text or title.

delete.description: Permanently delete an attachment and its file from storage.

post.description: Bulk delete multiple attachments by their IDs.

ids.description: Array of attachment IDs to delete

get.description: Returns all product attributes (e.g., Size, Color, Material) with their values. Used for product variations.

post.description: Create a new product attribute with its values. Used to define product variations (e.g., Size with values Small, Medium, Large).

get.description: Returns a single attribute with all its values.

put.description: Update an existing attribute and its values.

delete.description: Delete an attribute and all its values. Warning: This may affect products using this attribute.

post.description: Bulk delete multiple attributes by their IDs.
Login with email and password to get access token
Register a new user account
Send password reset token to email

get.description: Returns a paginated list of blog posts with optional category and tag filtering. Sticky posts are ordered first for public users.

post.description: Create a new blog post with categories and tags.

content.example: Full blog content with HTML support

get.description: Returns a single blog post with full content, categories, and tags.
Returns a blog post by its URL-friendly slug.
Get current user's cart items (requires authentication)

post.description: Add a product to cart (requires authentication)

delete.description: Remove a product from cart (requires authentication)

post.description: Sync cart items (requires authentication)

get.description: Returns paginated list of categories with subcategories

post.description: Create a new category (requires authentication)

get.description: Returns a single category with subcategories
Returns all countries with their states. Use this for shipping address forms.
Returns a single country with all its states.
Returns a paginated list of discount coupons. Vendors only see their own coupons.

post.description: Create a new discount coupon with usage limits and date restrictions.

get.description: Returns all available currencies for the store.

post.description: Add a new currency with exchange rate.

get.description: Returns paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user.

put.description: Mark one or all notifications as read.

id.description: Notification ID (omit to mark all as read)

get.description: Returns paginated list of orders (requires authentication)

post.description: Create a new order/checkout (requires authentication)

get.description: Returns a single order with details
Track order status by order number
Verify payment status for an order
Returns paginated list of products with optional filters

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by: asc, desc, a-z, z-a, high-to-low, low-to-high

post.description: Create a new product (requires authentication)

get.description: Returns a single product
Returns a single product by its slug
Returns paginated reviews. Vendors only see reviews for their products.

post.description: Submit a review for a product. User must have purchased the product.

description.example: Great product! Fast shipping and excellent quality.

get.description: Returns public reviews for products. No authentication required.
Returns public application settings
Returns paginated list of vendor stores

post.description: Register a new vendor store

get.description: Returns a single store with details
Returns a single store by its slug
Returns all tags used for products and blogs. Can be filtered by type.

post.description: Create a new tag for products or blogs.

get.description: Returns all configured tax rates.
Returns a paginated list of all users. Requires admin authentication.

post.description: Create a new user account. Requires admin authentication.

message.example: The email has already been taken.

get.description: Returns a single user with full details including addresses, wallet, and points.

post.description: Bulk delete multiple users by their IDs.
Bulk import users from a CSV file.
Export all users data to a downloadable CSV file.

get.description: Returns user's wallet balance and transaction history with optional date filtering.

post.description: Add funds to a consumer's wallet. Admin only.
Deduct funds from a consumer's wallet. Admin only.

get.description: Get current user's wishlist items (requires authentication)

post.description: Add a product to wishlist (requires authentication)

delete.description: Remove a product from wishlist (requires authentication)
